description: Deadly-calm anger: high anger with suppressed rage; precise, controlled hostility (optionally edged with contempt).
actor_description: My body goes still on purpose. The anger doesn't flare—it tightens. My voice gets flatter, my words fewer. I'm not losing control. I'm choosing where to apply it.
description_text: {actor} goes unnervingly calm—jaw set, movements deliberate, eyes fixed as if measuring the next exact step.
